channel.title: Zexscape
channel.description:
[size=72pt]ZexScape[/size]
Finished:
-new login box -new squeal of fortune -new shop interface -new game frame -completely redid cache -recoded all skills and minigames -recoded quest tab to custom player panel/staff panel
To come:
-custom minigames -clue scrolls -random events -custom grand exchange - a lot more
[size=40pt]note: I had to change from deathlypvpz v2 to a blank source becuz deathlypvpz just didn't make me happy.[/size]
Pics will come in morning
Suggestions are welcome
Thanks, mrnessie
